name: Classic Club Sandwich
description: Triple-decker sandwich with roasted turkey, ham, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise on toasted white bread.

name: Katsu Sando
description: A refined Japanese sandwich featuring a thick slice of crispy fried pork cutlet and shredded cabbage, dressed with tonkatsu sauce on soft milk bread.

name: Spicy Chicken Satay Wrap
description: Skewered chicken marinated in turmeric and spices, grilled, and wrapped in a warm flatbread with creamy peanut sauce and fresh cucumber salad.
